title: Interpretation of seeing surahs of the Qur’an according to each surah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing surahs of the Qur’an according to each surah in a dream. From the Qur’an in a dream and get rid of other bad dreams that may bother the dreamer. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing surahs of the Qur’an according to each surah in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream, this means that the dreamer will be facilitated by good and evil in his life. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Bathaar in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will support him as God Almighty guides him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream When the dreamer sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Imran, this means that the dreamer will confront lying people with honesty. And clear thinking. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat An-Nisa in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will divide the inheritance among some women. Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream, this means that the dreamer will rise above his height. His position will appear among the people. The vision indicates an increase in the dreamer’s piety and the uprightness of his religion. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-An’am, this means that the dreamer will provide him with livestock and livestock. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-A’raf in a dream When the dreamer sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Araf in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has been commanded by God Almighty to visit Mt. Sinai. Likewise, when the dreamer sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Anfal in a dream, this means that the dreamer will triumph over his enemies and will be able to gain many spoils of war. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream, this It indicates that the dreamer will repent to God Almighty before his death, in contrast to his good behavior among people in this world. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Yunus in a dream, this means that the dreamer will not be harmed or harmed by magic or envy in this world. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Hud in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Hud in a dream, this means that The dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty to plow as long as God provides him with offspring. But when the dreamer sees that he is reciting Surat Yusuf in a dream, this means that the dreamer will pursue him for a while, but he will win after this period and raise his status. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream, this means that The dreamer will turn gray at an early stage in his life. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Ibrahim in a dream, this means that the dreamer will draw closer to God Almighty and his religion will improve. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Hijr in a dream When the dreamer sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Hijr in a dream, this means that the dreamer will become One of the people who enjoys a high status and status among the people. When the dreamer sees that he is reading Surat Al-Nal in a dream, this means

title: I dreamed that I killed a snake

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a killed snake in a dream via roy2a.com. Seeing killing a snake in a dream has many connotations. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a snake killed in a dream, depending on the state and circumstances of the priest and whether the man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through the vision website we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a snake killed in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Sadiq, so follow us. I dreamed that I killed a snake in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Seeing a snake being killed in a dream indicates the end of all the worries and evils that were in the dreamer’s life and the beginning of a new era in which there is no evil. Seeing a man killing a snake on a bed in a dream mentions his wife’s approach, and God knows best. Seeing a sick snake in a dream. It seems that he will recover from this disease soon, and God knows best. Seeing a snake in a dream indicates many enemies in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a green snake in a dream. I dreamed that I killed a snake in a dream about a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman killing a snake in The dream indicates that the coming period of her life will be full of good things and many good things for her. Seeing an unmarried woman killing a white snake in a dream indicates that bad things happened to her in her love life and she will be exposed to great disappointment. Seeing an unmarried woman killing a snake and eating its meat In a dream, it shows that promising things will happen in the near future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream. I dreamed that I killed a snake in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman killing a snake in a dream says that there are bad people in her life who are planning tricks to get her into it, but she will be able to Overcoming them. Seeing a married woman bitten by a snake in a dream indicates the emergence of major problems and crises in her life during the coming period. Seeing a married green snake in a dream indicates an evil friend trying to make her commit a major sin in her life. Seeing a married woman carrying a yellow snake in a dream indicates disagreements. And the many problems between her and her husband that may lead to their separation. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake by Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that I killed a snake in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman killing a snake in a dream indicates the ease of her birth process and that she and her fetus will be in good health after the birth process. Seeing the eggs of a pregnant snake In a dream, she announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a white snake in a dream. I dreamed that I killed a snake in a dream about a man. Seeing a man killing a snake in a dream shows that there is a disabled person in his life who is always jealous and envious. Seeing a man killing a snake in his bed in a dream suggests that he He will divorce his wife soon, and God knows best. I dreamed that my husband was killing a snake. Seeing a married wife killing a snake to defend her in a dream announces that she will get rid of her enemies thanks to her husband and save her from them. A married woman sees her husband killing a snake in the dream.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an injection in a dream for a man and a woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an injection in a dream is complete from the books of academic translators of visions and dreams and through the Trend website specialized in jurisprudence and interpretation. The same thing with a man’s dreams. Why dream of a doctor’s needle by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says in his book “Interpretation of Dreams” that if he sees in a dream a whole needle or a medical syringe, this means that the dreamer’s life will be rewarded with goodness, and that God will give him good things and benefits. It also indicates that seeing A broken syringe or needle from a doctor in a complete dream indicates many problems and worries in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. He also explained to us that if a person sees himself in a dream complete and takes a needle and uses it, this is evidence that he will break his promises and not keep his words. It is always indicated Until someone who sees a complete injection in a dream means that God will change his situation for him and his activity will return to him, and God knows best. Why do you dream of an injection for poor women? It is said that if an unmarried girl sees a complete doctor’s needle in a dream, this indicates his help and the nearness of marriage, and this will fill her with joy and happiness. And God knows best. In the same way, if a girl dreams that she is getting a needle from a doctor, this indicates her success and success in what she wants. They also say that if a girl sees a broken syringe in a complete dream, this is a sign of the problems and complexes that she will face in her life. It is noted that in most Circumstances: A doctor’s needle goes to an unmarried woman in a dream completely as a sign of goodness, vitality, and happiness, and God knows best. Why do you dream of a doctor’s needle to a married woman? They say: If a married woman sees herself in a dream stuffed with a doctor’s needle, this indicates the end of distress and the end of sorrows, and God knows best. The doctor’s needle always indicates Goodness, happiness, and good news. But if he sees in a dream a complete injection, how the needle broke, then this is evidence of problems and disasters, and God knows best. Why does a doctor’s needle dream of a leg? It is always indicated that if a person sees a complete injection in a dream, this is evidence of the persistence of problems and diseases, and God is a healer. It is also indicated Piercing a man in a dream indicates that God will give him a good wife. Why does a pregnant woman dream of an injection? They say that if a pregnant woman sees in a dream a plump woman having her throat removed by a doctor, this indicates an easy and smooth birth and the health of her fetus, and God knows best. It is said that the pregnant woman who sees the needle Always show kindness and support, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Common mistakes in singing...and how to avoid them to reach the world immediately

preview.html: Singing is a visual art that requires innate talent and the ability to use the larynx and vocal cords in a way that makes the pronunciation of words musically consistent with the melody, and he dreams of this great artistic field. Common mistakes in singing The most common mistakes in singing: A singer or practitioner practices it without paying attention to it by choosing vocal layers that conflict with the ability of the larynx to produce words and interpret them clearly in harmony, which leads to some words getting stuck in the throat and not coming out correctly, and there is a clear dissonance in singing. Exercising or singing loudly can strain the vocal cords, especially before a concert. Trying to match the words with the notes before hearing the melody is one of the most common mistakes in singing, but you must first memorize the melody well, then you can match the words and choose the appropriate levels with the voice and melody that will appear. In a consistent and enjoyable way. The correct distance between the singer and the microphone affects the quality of the sound transmitted to the listeners and their ability to interpret the words clearly, as my voice is sharp and must be far enough away from the microphone so as not to harm the listeners. The audience as in opera concerts. Morning training is a common mistake in singing that most beginners do not notice. After a period of sleep of more than eight hours, the larynx is in a dry state, the vocal cords are relaxed, and sudden fatigue of them, especially with high notes, leads to hoarseness that may last for hours or days. Until the larynx and vocal cords return to their place. Natural >> Adjective. Lack of adequate sleep and rest exhausts the body and negatively affects the quality of the voice, as well as smoking and drinking alcohol, which damage the vocal cords. Not paying attention to the type of food and drink that the singer eats is a common mistake in singing that no one cares about, for example when eating watermelon or pickles, you can only sing for a few minutes and then the voice disappears completely after a clear dissonance in the vocal layers, so do not risk eating food like before training and parties, as well as drinking cold drinks, as it harms the throat and vocal cords, making them cold and deepening the voice. . Attention should be paid to changing the levels and tones of the voice with the change in age and training for classes according to each age stage, whether in childhood, adolescence and youth to adulthood and vocal maturity. Stages of development. Failure to organize concerts and training courses in a way that ensures sufficient rest periods for the mind, ear, throat and vocal cords, especially when moving from one artistic work to another, so that each work is given the right to maintain it. And to adjust it and appear. In a separate form. The layers of the beautiful voice do not mix and appear with the same artistic color in all songs, which causes boredom for followers and listeners. Work with professional trainers to avoid common singing mistakes, improve your voice and increase your talent. Do not hesitate to choose a distinguished singing center that nurtures and develops your talent. The most common mistakes in singing How to avoid common singing mistakes

title: Interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream. The meaning of a brother in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a brother for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, either an older brother, a younger brother, seeing a living brother, a dead brother, I dreamed that my brother died and went down. Ibn Sirin got married. Interpretation of a brother in a dream. If seeing a brother in a dream is one of the dreams that you have many, then know that this dream brings you positive reactions, because seeing your brother shows strength and is the opposite of weakness, and this means that the ordeal will end soon if you are. Transient replay. If you see that your brother has died in a dream and you cry over him, then this dream indicates the future that awaits you, because it will be full of sorrows and dangers and you will fall into many misfortunes. On the other hand, the death of a brother in a dream and your crying over him indicates recovery from an illness if it occurs For you. If you dream that your brother is happy and cheerful, then this dream shows happiness, money and what good things you can get in your daily life. If you are pregnant and see your brother in a dream, this is a sign that you will give birth to a male child. Seeing a brother in a dream indicates an upcoming partnership With you and the strength of brotherhood in the matters you are about to deal with, especially pending financial transactions. Seeing a brother in general in a dream means that you are working hard and will reap the rewards soon. Interpretation of a brother about his brother in a dream. The origin of the bond and attachment of brothers to each other is blood and not just their presence in the family alone. A brother seeing his brother in a dream is related to the emotions and safety factors that the person feels. Brother unconditionally, because brothers have been fellow travelers on the same road since childhood. If a brother sees his brother in a dream, his interpretation is interpreted by the same person, which means that if he sees that his brother has obtained a lot of money or goodness, it means That this person will soon have a lot of money and not a brother is another sign. Seeing the birth of a brother in a dream means that this person will soon hear good news, and seeing the brother wearing new clothes means that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better in the near future. Seeing rivalry and disagreements with A brother in a dream is an expression of the love that unites them. *But this interpretation does not apply if in reality there is a dispute between the brothers over an inheritance, money, housing, or any kind of dispute in reality. As for seeing a brother sick in a dream, this means one’s worries and problems in His life, and seeing the death of a brother in a dream means the long life of the one who sees it, in the event that death is not accompanied by other signs. Associated with death, such as burial or crying. And if one sees in a dream that he is burying his brother, this means that he will quarrel and interrupt his brother, and in general, seeing any goodness for the brother in a dream will bring goodness to the dreamer. A person may dream of a brother, or a grandfather, or an uncle, or An aunt, or someone who has a share in the inheritance, all of which indicate the act of sharing or helping with money. Perhaps they refer to each other as well. Interpretation of a sister to her brother in a dream. If a sister sees that she is marrying her brother in a dream, and she is an unmarried girl, this has a positive meaning that indicates the arrival of kindness, happiness, and livelihood that will return to the entire family members. After a

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing rubies in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a sapphire in a dream? Evidence of joy and happiness. What does it mean to see a sapphire in an unmarried girl’s dream? Evidence of a bright and prosperous future. What is the interpretation of a married woman’s dream of buying a ruby ​​necklace? Evidence of the fulfillment of the desires she wants. What does it mean to see a blue sapphire in a dream? One? Proof of money and expenses. What is the interpretation of seeing a golden ruby? It indicates the birth of a male. Interpretation of a dream about rubies by Ibn Sirin. Rubies in a dream are a sign of joy and happiness that the dreamer will be in. Rubies in a dream may indicate that the fortuneteller will be a religious person. Then if the dreamer sees If he takes rubies from the sea, this indicates a lot of money that he will obtain. Rubies found in the sea can indicate profit and abundant livelihood. Seeing a dream of rubies for a single woman If you see rubies in a dream, this means good luck and abundant sustenance. Rubies can indicate in An unmarried girl's dream is for a bright and prosperous future. So, seeing a blue sapphire in one dream is a sign of money and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about a sapphire for a man: If a man sees in a dream a sapphire without luster and does not shine, this means that he will be exposed to failure, anxiety, and sadness. Seeing a sapphire wreath In a dream, it is an indication of a man’s strength and influence after marriage. Then a man sees in a dream, a ruby ​​red ring, this vision is news of marriage, if he is single. Then a man sees in a dream that he is giving his wife a blue sapphire necklace made of silver, and this vision is evidence On the birth of a girl. Seeing a dream about a sapphire for a married woman. Sapphires can be a sign of wealth and goodness in a married woman’s dream. A sapphire in a married woman’s dream may indicate money that the husband will receive. Then a sapphire in a married woman’s dream also shows the inheritance that she will receive from where she does not Know. After that, when you see a married woman buying a sapphire necklace, this vision is evidence of the fulfillment of the desires she desires. Interpretation of a dream about sapphires for a pregnant woman. Seeing a blue sapphire in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news for a male child. Then seeing a colored sapphire is an indication of the presence of A female child. In general, sapphires in a pregnant woman’s dream are considered good and indicate a smooth and easy birth. Then seeing a sapphire of gold indicates the birth of a male. Seeing a sapphire dreaming about Nabulsi. Seeing a person in a dream a ring with a blue sapphire cut out, this indicates money and a bright future for the pioneer. Hence, seeing a ring with a white, cut-out sapphire is evidence that the dreamer is a religious person who memorizes the Book of God. The green sapphire crystal is considered an indication of the dreamer’s power and influence. In general, Al-Nabulsi interpreted the sapphire in the dream as good news.

title: Interpretation of seeing climbing a mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of climbing a mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Mountaineering is a difficult task that requires a lot of strength, concentration, patience and courage to do things that seemed deadly to ordinary people. Some people see in their dreams that they are climbing a mountain or a height, and many scary things happened in the dream, such as a person falling from a height or being injured, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of climbing a mountain. A mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Interpretation of a dream when you see yourself climbing a mountain. Dream interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing a mountain climber in a dream expresses the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life who seek to harm him, and this vision shows victory over them in reality, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that He climbed a mountain in a dream and saw water on its peak, then this vision shows kindness and strength represented by earning money, but if he finds food, then this vision means his marriage to a woman of good morals. But if the dreamer dreams that he is carrying a bowl of water with him while climbing the mountain, then this vision symbolizes him With piety, guidance, and good luck. If the mountain that the dreamer is climbing in the dream is Mount Arafat, then this vision shows an understanding in religion. But if you see a mountain climbing and then descending from it in a dream, this means that the dreamer was able to achieve tremendous success in achieving the goals that He seeks it on the ground. If the dreamer climbs to the top of the mountain and finds a lot of lava on it, then this vision is repulsive and indicates that the dreamer is going through crises in reality. Seeing a sick person climbing a mountain in a dream is good news for recovery from his illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing climbing a mountain in a dream For a single woman: As for an unmarried girl, this vision is a praiseworthy dream for her, and it means goodness, life, and happiness for her. If a single woman dreams that she is trying to climb to the top of a mountain, this vision shows the efforts she is making to achieve what she wants. If an unmarried girl sees that she is climbing The mountain with difficulty, this vision symbolizes that she does not achieve what she desires in reality, and this vision shows her separation from her partner, and God knows best. In the case of descending from the mountain in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will face conflicts with those close to her. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain For a married woman: As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees that she is climbing the mountain easily, then this vision is only an indication of the ease of the dreamer’s circumstances. In the case of climbing the green mountain in a dream, this vision is one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams, as it indicates the stability of her married life and the end of Her problems with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman climbing a mountain to its summit shows the high status she enjoys in reality and it is also a sign of overcoming difficulties. If descending from a mountain in a dream, this vision indicates comfort, and God knows best. Dreams generally occur more in women than in men, because they hide many thoughts and feelings and involve many emotions

title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I see myself putting on makeup in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men to put on eye makeup in front of women, and buy makeup, cosmetics, eyeliner, and lipstick, according to Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-Sadiq from Ibn Sirin, Fahd Al-Usaimi and others. Makeup in a dream is one of the dreams The beauty that we dream of in a dream, especially women who wear makeup on their faces to a great extent in reality, as the subconscious mind thinks very intensely about applying makeup, which makes us see the dream, and it has a lot of important meanings and associations that reach the dreamer, and in fact it should To know it and pay full attention to it. As dream interpreter Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretations, important meanings and suggestions come to the dreamer about seeing makeup in a dream so that he can learn about it. Interpretation of makeup in a dream If you see that you are wearing makeup in a dream, this means that you are trying to hide an aspect of your personality or something in Your life, and in most cases the thing you need to hide is negative. Whoever sees that she has put on makeup or decorations, this is an adornment and happiness for her life. Wearing makeup in a dream symbolizes the desire to improve yourself and people’s true image. Whoever sees that she is wearing makeup indicates that the one who praises her with words that are not in it, That is, it is hypocrisy. Revealing hair indicates that her husband may leave her for a while or that there are problems between her and her husband. Revealing hair also indicates the separation of the spouses. Makeup in a dream indicates a desire to enhance self-confidence. If you see yourself wearing makeup in an excessive manner, this indicates that you often care about appearance. ExteriorIf you see yourself putting kohl in the eye, this indicates insight. If you see yourself standing in front of a woman, this symbolizes marriage. If you are single, and if you are married, this means that you will have a child who looks like you. Interpretation of makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Wearing makeup often indicates in The dream indicates dissatisfaction with your condition and the desire to change. To see yourself wearing makeup indicates an occasion that requires shaving and beautification, such as an engagement, a party, or the like. This event could be yours or yours to attend. Wearing makeup in a dream means that something in your life is hidden from the eyes. Others It could be a topic or even behavior Seeing yourself wearing good makeup in a dream may indicate your success in your work If there are flaws in the makeup or you don’t like it, it may indicate difficulties you are facing in your ability to change If a pregnant woman sees herself wearing makeup in a dream, it may This indicates that the gender of the baby is female. For a man, if he sees himself wearing makeup in a dream, this may mean that he is hiding something that he does not want or that he is appearing in front of people. Seeing a man wearing makeup in a dream and the makeup was clear or exciting, this may indicate an undesirable image. Among people, he may have hidden things, but not in a good way. It may be easy for him to reveal himself, or he may appear to be playing or pretending. Hidden makeup can indicate

title: Interpretation of using a watch in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of wearing a watch in a dream, as the watch has great importance in people’s lives, as it is the only way to know the time and helps you feel alert and alert, and watches are also of great importance in knowing the time. There are many different types and in the following lines of this article from the encyclopedia we will learn about seeing a watch in a dream and what dream interpretation scholars have mentioned about the meaning of these visions, so follow us. Interpretation of using a watch in a dream Commentators say that a watch in a dream generally symbolizes the feelings that a person experiences. Ibn Sirin believes that Wearing a gold watch in his sleep, this vision indicates that God Almighty will grant him a long life and blessings in provision. Whoever sees the watch in his dream, this dream can symbolize that the dreamer is waiting for an important decision in his life, and that this decision is about to happen, and he feels anticipation and waiting, so Seeing a watch indicates these feelings by what he feels. Interpretation of using a watch in a dream: One of the most promising dreams is for a person to dream of wearing a wristwatch, and this dream shows that he is a loyal person, who keeps his promises and fulfills the promises he made to himself. The girl who sees in her dream that she is wearing a watch and the watch New, this vision portends to the girl that new changes will occur in her life and these changes will make her feel satisfied and happy. These changes may be her connection to a man she loves or feels happy with. Or moving to a new job or getting a promotion in her current job. A bad dream is for a person to see in his dream that he is wearing a wristwatch, and this watch is old and he does not feel comfortable wearing it, but he returns to his life again carrying negative feelings and sorrows that affect the life of the dreamer. If a person sees that he is wearing a watch in his hand and then sees that the glass of the watch has fallen and shattered and its parts are scattered, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will receive bad news that will make him feel very sad. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a watch in an unmarried girl’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing A golden watch. This vision foretells the girl that she will get married soon, God willing. If the watch she is wearing is silver, then this dream symbolizes the emotional state of this girl and that she lives in a state of love, in which she feels comfortable and happy and will soon communicate with the person she loves. Among the visions are What is good for an unmarried girl is to see that the watch she is wearing has broken and stopped rotating. This dream symbolizes that the girl will be late in getting married and that she will regret this delay. Interpretation of wearing a watch in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is buying a new watch, wearing it, and feels happy when she Wearing it, this dream indicates the happiness and stability that she experiences in her family life. One of the dreams that cannot be interpreted is that a woman sees in her dream that the watch she is wearing is broken, and this vision means that there will be many problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and that she and her husband will not that. are able to solve these problems

title: Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman of Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman Scientists have said a lot about it, but let us define it, as it is one of the favorite foods for adults and children, but it should not be increased like many people do. It causes many health problems, but what about eating sweets in a dream? Since this vision is one of the visions that many people see in their dreams, they search for an interpretation of seeing it in a dream to know what is good or bad for them. You can follow the article on the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman through: Otherwise, the interpretation of receiving sweets in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing sweets in a dream is a praiseworthy dream because it indicates good money and abundance. If it turns out that he is eating the candy that he loves in his dream, this indicates that he will find the money that he lost or lost a long time ago. Seeing sweets in your dream and seeing yourself eating candied dates in your dreams indicates a significant increase in money and an increase in abundance and goodness. If a young man is single and sees in his dream that he is eating sweets, this means that he will earn a lot of money in the near future, especially if he is inclined to open business projects. Giving sweets to someone in a dream and interpreted by Ibn Sirin means love, mutual loyalty, gaining the admiration of others, and doing business based on appreciation and respect. If one is getting married, then this vision indicates that the date of marriage is already approaching and many good things will come to him. If one sees sweets And if it tastes delicious, this symbolizes decent living, prosperity, and the enjoyment of wonderful mental health. If someone is in danger, this vision portends salvation, achieving the desired victories, and many victories. If one sees that he is eating sugar cane, this symbolizes abundant praise and glorification, which The soul deserves them, to hear the joy of the soul. In general, seeing sweets is a vision of a good life, a lot of food, goodness and blessings in life and good work. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets with relatives If you see a man eating a cake in a dream, this means that he will marry a woman with special charm In the future, he will be loved like no other. If a man sees that he breaks his fast with sweets in Ramadan, this is evidence that he married a righteous woman with good intentions and morals. If a person sees himself eating this cake, this indicates that he will have sex with many women. Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman symbolizes her happy life , many joys and happy days, and hearing a lot of happy news. If the vision sees him eating goats, this indicates the many blessings that a person receives from legal sources. Seeing him eating could be a reflection of the dreamer wanting to eat cake in reality or that he is eating too much in reality. So the vision is a message to reduce the consumption of sweets
